paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: The paper discusses a modified surgical technique for managing secondary open-angle glaucoma in hereditary transthyretin amyloidosis (hATTR) patients. It mentions the Val30Met mutation in the TTR gene but does not provide detailed variant-specific data or penetrance information.

functional_data.summary: The Val30Met mutation is the most common TTR variant associated with hATTR.

variants.additional_notes: The paper focuses on surgical outcomes rather than genetic analysis.
key_quotes: The Val30Met mutation is the most common TTR variant in Portugal and around the world.

challenges: The paper primarily focuses on surgical techniques and outcomes, with limited genetic data.
extraction_metadata.notes: The paper mentions the Val30Met mutation but does not provide detailed penetrance or individual-level genetic data.
